name: Paneer Butter Masala with Naan
description: Creamy tomato-based curry with soft paneer cubes served with butter naan.

name: Chicken Tikka Burger
description: Juicy chicken tikka patty with mint chutney mayo and fresh onions.

description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with spiced chicken and saffron.

name: Masala Dosa

name: Gulab Jamun with Rabri
description: Soft milk-solid dumplings soaked in sugar syrup served with chilled rabri.
